alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 8:44PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Custer and northwestern Oglala Lakota Counties through 915 PM MDT... At 844 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southwest of Red Shirt, or 26 miles northeast of Hot Springs, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Red Shirt Table Overlook. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for southwestern South Dakota.
